title: South Korea - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 3,500 BDT (Processing Fee) + Additional cost for translation/notary if applicable
validity: Typically up to 90 days (as decided by embassy)

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 6 months validity from travel date
Two recent color passport-size photos (35mm x 45mm, matte paper, white background)
Minimum bank balance of 700,000 BDT per person maintained until passport return
NID card, TIN certificate, and income tax return certificate
Covid-19 vaccination completion certificate
Notarized and translated marriage certificate if spouse name is not mentioned in passport
Relevant documentation for employment, business, or student status
Optional: Invitation letter and supporting documents from Korean host if applicable

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport (current and previous) with at least 6 months validity
Two passport-size photos (35mm x 45mm, white background, no cap/glasses)
Two sets of visiting cards
Personal bank statement for last 6 months and solvency certificate (sealed and signed)
NID card copy
TIN certificate and income tax return certificate
Covid-19 vaccination certificate
Notarized and English-translated marriage certificate if required

For Job Holders: NOC/Employment Certificate with details, salary certificate, last 6 months' salary slips or account statements, office ID, GO (if govt. employee), BMDC/BAR Council/Retirement certificate as applicable
For Businesspersons: Office pad, company bank statement, renewed trade license with notarized English copy, memorandum (for limited companies)
For Students: Photocopies of student ID card (both sides), birth certificate
If Invited: Invitation letter, passport/ID copy of inviter, affidavit/guarantee letter from host

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
